context: University system evaluating expansion of online learning platform to accommodate 50% increase in enrollment and new international partnerships

request.purpose: Platform expansion including cloud infrastructure upgrade, content management system enhancement, and international compliance features
request.justification: Projected 50% enrollment increase, international expansion opportunities, improved learning outcomes with personalized adaptive learning

decision_process.outcome: Platform requires significant upgrade to handle projected load
Strong support with specific feature requirements identified
Preferred vendor selected with comprehensive solution package
Funding secured through combination of reserves, tuition increase, and educational grants

business_impact.expected_outcome: 50% enrollment capacity increase, international market expansion, improved student retention and completion rates
business_impact.projected_value: $25 million in additional revenue over 5 years

alternatives_considered.evaluation: Rejected - insufficient capacity for projected growth
Rejected - timeline and risk too high

lessons_learned: Academic technology decisions require extensive stakeholder engagement, international expansion demands comprehensive compliance planning, scalability testing critical for large-scale deployments
